Author: Nikolas.Glushe
Title: [ANN] ODEM.io, On Demand Education: Featured Forbes, INC.
Body: Dear ODEM community. We are pleased to inform you about our project https://odchats.top/ which logs all important telegram chats related to ODEM . We believe that ODEM Chats will be a valuable addition to the ODEM ecosystem. During the work of the site, we have already received a large number of positive feedback from community members. The project is under active development. The project has its own team of programmers, ready at any time to solve new technical problems and make new improvements.  What is implemented at the moment: You can read your favorite sites in a convenient form for you through https://odchats.top/ The site is optimized for work and on mobile devices. There is a search by keyword and date. It is possible to read the chat you want in your native language using Google Translate. The translation is not perfect, but it will allow you to receive the latest news as quickly as possible from the first sources.  In the near future, we plan to add the ability to share a specific telegram post in social networks. On the one hand, this will allow you to share interesting content with your friends and subscribers, and on the other hand, it will positively influence the development of ODEM’s popularity in general.  There is a lot of work ahead, we have planned a huge number of interesting and useful improvements. If you have any suggestions for improving our site, please write - we will try to take everything into account and use it in the further development of the site.  If you think that some important chat related to ODEM is missing on our website, please write and we will add it.

Author: kohanvn
Title: [ANN] ODEM.io, On Demand Education: Featured Forbes, INC.
Body: There are many ways in which the education system that prevails in most countries is failing students. Top universities are often reserved for the elite and the curriculum being taught at a higher education level is irrelevant, outdated, and cannot compete with the ever-changing necessities of the job market. And all of this comes at a high cost.  That is why the ODEM solution combines the Excelorators’ services and its network of over 200 professors at top universities, with a Blockchain and smart contract-based platform that eliminates the middleman and, with it, unnecessary fees.  https://t.co/BMJ3yjcKe2

Author: ODEMtoken
Title: [ANN] ODEM.io, On Demand Education: Featured Forbes, INC.
Body: Awesome question! ODEM.io is creating a decentralized education marketplace for educators to list classes and students to connect directly with services. Our platform removes costly intermediaries and makes educational programs more affordable and accessible. Students may search the platform for existing educational programs or request their own. Utilizing smart contracts, each party may leverage a series of precommitments that ensure payment is sent/received only after all terms are met. When the criteria is met for educator and student, the educational program is then created, payment released, and additional students may join. The ODEM [On Demand Education Marketplace] makes it possible for students to find and confirm a class within our portal and then engage in-person with the educator. We strongly believe in the power of classroom experiences  to drive education forward.

Author: ODEMtoken
Title: [ANN] ODEM.io, On Demand Education: Featured Forbes, INC.
Body: Thanks for your feedback. ODEM is not utilizing blockchain simply for blockchain's sake. There are certainly great projects that offer online education, however, the key takeaway is that ODEM is a platform for real, in-person education. While online education is excellent for reach, the completion rate tends to hover around 5-15%. We're empowering students with education in the real world for the the real world.

Author: ODEMtoken
Title: [ANN] ODEM.io, On Demand Education: Featured Forbes, INC.
Body: ODEM is launching with a core base of 200 professors from elite institutions. We are fortunate to be using a current, profitable company - our sister, Excelorators as a launchpad for our ICO's success.  As noted, ODEM'a BETA process will include 200 of Excelorator's best providers and will tap into a network of 600 educators to launch our initial programs. The educator will be reviewed based on their experience, credentials, and will also be rated based on the success of their courses by students within the ODEM platform. Trust and transparency are incredibly important at ODEM, so we will be reviewing reputation very carefully in selecting and growing our base of providers.

Author: ODEMtoken
Title: [ANN] ODEM.io, On Demand Education: Featured Forbes, INC.
Body: Thanks for your feedback, saerdnaa. The ODEM team is always happy to answer any questions. Glad that you reached out on bitcointalk.  The ODEM Token is not a means of payment. We are utilizing the Discount Token Model, described further herehttps://youtu.be/q3J0moylTA8. The ODEM Token is used as platform license within the ODEM platform. ODEM Tokens may be escrowed to defray fees for using the platform to book educational experiences. The ODEM Token effectively lowers the cost of education for holders. Tokens may also used by companies and individuals to sponsor students within the platform.  Please let us know if you have any additional questions about ODEM!

Author: ODEMtoken
Title: [ANN] ODEM.io, On Demand Education: Featured Forbes, INC.

While ODEM as a platform is not geared to replace elementary schooling, we will be including offerings to expand exposure to new subjects like AI and entrepreneurship earlier in life.

Author: ODEMtoken
Title: [ANN] ODEM.io, On Demand Education: Featured Forbes, INC.
Body: At ODEM, we are huge believers that learning is a lifelong journey and that front-loading education does not always best serve students. The ODEM platform will help students of all ages to engage in in-person learning with world class instructors. The opportunity to partake in short-to-medium term classes gives students the opportunity to immerse themselves in subjects and certifications without the burdening cost of a traditional institutions.

Author: ODEMtoken
Title: [ANN] ODEM.io, On Demand Education: Featured Forbes, INC.
Body: Absolutely! The total token supply is 396,969,697 with the following allocations - 60% crowdsale, 19% company, 10% Team and Advisors, 10% ODEM Rewards, 1% Bounty. 58,200,000 ODEM Tokens were set aside for our very successful closed presale in December. 238,200,000 in total have been allocated for the token sale.  Let us know if you have any further questions!

Author: ODEMtoken
Title: [ANN] ODEM.io, On Demand Education: Featured Forbes, INC.
Body: Yes, the ODEM campaign is live! The ODEM token serves a few key purposes within the ODEM platform. We've briefly included below:  ODEM.IO’s problem-busting interactive platform will empower students to engage collectively with top academics around the world to access educational experiences at a reasonable cost. Specifically, the platform uses machine learning, or artificial intelligence, technology to streamline and coordinate the organization and delivery of short-and-medium-term training and academic courses.   At its core, the ODEM.IO solution uses the blockchain-based ODEM Token to align incentives for platform. The token enables coordination among service providers, helps to simplify cross-border payments and functions as a currency to encourage professors to develop popular course offerings. Overall, ODEM.IO uses blockchain technology to support three types of coordination.   1. ODEM.IO employs a blockchain-based discount token model to allow platform users the to escrow tokens to gain discounts against user fees. Proceeds from the sale of tokens fund the community’s development effort.   2. ODEM.IO’s program generator uses a decentralized ledger (another term for blockchain) to track conditional pre-commitments which enable recommendation, discovery and orchestration of educational programs.  3. Finally, the blockchain facilitates multi-payer, multi-payee transactions that arise when a group of students is matched with educators and host of support services to create a complete educational package. ODEM.IO platform also maintains information about the identity and reputation of community participants.

Author: ODEMtoken
Title: [ANN] ODEM.io, On Demand Education: Featured Forbes, INC.
Body: ODEM.IO UNLOCKING HIGHER EDUCATION  The On Demand Education Marketplace – making high-quality education affordable for everyone    We’re thrilled to announce the creation of Switzerland-based ODEM AG, a launchpad for ODEM.IO, the world’s first On-Demand Education Marketplace. We’d be hard pressed to find a better location from which to introduce ODEM.IO and its collaborative, interactive approach to education. Our platform empowers students to engage with top academics around the world to create high-quality onsite educational experiences at a reasonable cost.  In today’s environment of dodgy crypto projects and outright scams, Switzerland and its local blockchain entrepreneurs are focused on winning a reputation for quality and honesty. They’re building a hybrid system of government oversight and self-regulation that we find invigorating. In September, the local Crypto Valley Association announced its support for a code of conduct to provide a legal and moral framework for developers of initial coin offerings in Switzerland. The goal is to become the world’s leading blockchain and crypto ecosystem.  Our mission at ODEM.IO focuses on empowering people who do not find their fit within the structures of existing education institutions. The ODEM platform uses blockchain technology to streamline the logistics of organizing and delivering short-and-medium-term academic experiences that have traditionally been plagued by inefficiencies. Blockchain technology also underpins the creation of what we call ODEM Token, an exchangeable digital token that will ease cross-border payments and encourage professors to align their course offerings with students’ changing needs.  ODEM.IO focuses on empowering people who do not find their fit within the structures of existing education institutions.The platform, which aspires to become the Airbnb of education, owes its inspiration to partner company Excelorators Inc., and its more than five years of experience in crafting high-quality educational experiences for international students and foreign executives at top U.S. universities.  Excelorators already has a network of more than 200 professors and education industry service providers to spearhead adoption of the ODEM platform.  Visit ODEM.IO to sign up for upcoming notices on how to participate.  Whitepaper : https://odem.io/docs/whitepaper/whitePaper-V1.2.pdf  Join us on Telegram http://t.me/odem_io and stay tuned!    ODEM IN THE NEWS! https://www.inc.com/bill-carmody/4-revolutions-made-possible-by-blockchain-economy.html https://www.forbes.com/sites/haroldstark/2017/12/12/keep-an-eye-on-these-blockchain-startups-throughout-2018
